data.text: @castawaySOS That was fascinating and depressing. But pretty much what I expected.

@Literatrix Have You read this one on Matt Lauer/Ann Curry?  Terrific piece - the author also wrote the Jann Wenner bio that has gotten raves - just picked that one up.
https://t.co/VRTguOEY5E
@J_David_Clarke Totally agree. And Ann Curry is a sweetheart. Once again, #KarmaSaysFuckYou.
@Literatrix He was a pathetic excuse for journalist way before he was a sexual predator. No big loss.
